original_text: And the priest shall examine the disease and shut up that which has the disease for seven days.
korean_text: 제사장은 그 색점을 진찰하고 그것을 이레 동안 간직하였다가

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall examine the disease
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장은 그 병을 살펴볼 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and shut up that which has the disease for seven days
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 병이 있는 그것을 이레 동안 가둘 것입니다
